txt_en: The problems of your future are my privilege.
txt_cn: 参与你的未来是我的荣幸。

txt_en: Just do whatever feels natural.
My heart will go on.
Each snowflake is water waiting to be released in spring.
txt_cn: 每片雪花都将在春天融化，化作生命之泉。

txt_en: Stick to the light. Embrace it.
It helps no one to dwell on the past.
Another day. Gotta keep it together.
You had me at "hello."
txt_cn: 你的一句问好，便已俘获我心。

txt_en: May this year be everything you wish for.
txt_cn: 祝你新的一年，心想事成。

txt_en: New year. New life.
It's every human being's right to know love.
There's no bravery without fear.
All humans are imperfect.
Loving you is worth everything to me.
The potential is limitless.
Giving up is for rookies.
Life only moves forward.
txt_cn: 人生只能向前走，不能回头。

txt_en: I never wish to be parted from you from this day on.
txt_cn: 愿我们从今天起永不分离。

txt_en: We can't rely on luck.
I will always love you best.
Tomorrow will bring a new world.
txt_cn: 明天将是一个全新的世界。

txt_en: From now onward, I will be prepared to be much stronger.
txt_cn: 从现在开始，我将变得更加强大。

txt_en: Lanterns have not only lit up the night, but also illuminated hearts that long for home.
txt_cn: 元宵节的灯笼不仅照亮了黑夜，也照亮了人们渴望回家的心。

txt_en: Look beyond what you see.
